T02bsu010_u:2: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma kalantakanivāse veṇuvane mahatā bhikṣusaṅaghena sārdhaṃ dviśatapacāśadbhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ /
T02bsu010_u:3: atha bhagavānanekaśatasahasraparivāraparivṛtaḥ purato 'valokya dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
T02bsu010_u:4: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyajanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati sma //
T02bsu010_u:5: 2. tadā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo vimvisāraḥ mahātā rājavibhavena mahatā ca rājabalena rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena veṇuvanaṃ yena ca bhagavān tenopasaṅakramīt /
T02bsu010_u:6: upasaṅakramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte atiṣṭhat /
T02bsu010_u:7: ekānte sthitvā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavantametadavocat /
T02bsu010_u:8: kathaṃ bhagavan kṛtaṃ karma saṃcayaṃ pratirudhya ciraniruddhaṃ maraṇakāla upasthitaṃ manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
T02bsu010_u:11: tadyathā mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
T02bsu010_u:13: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja svapne sā janapadakalyāṇī strī //
T02bsu010_u:15: 5. bhagavānāha!tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ kiṃ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
T02bsu010_u:18: atyantatayā tu bhagavan svapne janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate /
T02bsu010_u:22: 7. bhagavānāha!evameva mahārāja balo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi ddaṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyabhiniviśet /
T02bsu010_u:25: saṃrakto rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanobhirabhisaṃskaroti /
T02bsu010_u:27: niruddhaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
T02bsu010_u:34: tat karma kadācinmaraṇa kālasamaya upasthite tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāt caramavijñāne niruddhe manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
T02bsu010_u:44: tasya ca mahārāja prathamavijñānasya samanantaraniraddhasya tatsabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate
T02bsu010_u:46: tatra mahārāja na kaściddharmaḥ asmāt lokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmati /
T02bsu010_u:62: prathamavijñānasya mahārāja aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya nirantarā cittasantatiḥ pravartate /
T02bsu010_u:68: 9. yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
T02bsu010_u:69: nāsau saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā //
T02bsu010_u:70: 10. nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmnā nāma na vidyate /
T02bsu010_u:73: sāpyatra kalpanā śūnyā yayā śūnyā vikalpitāḥ //
T02bsu010_u:78: 14. na cakṣūḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca /
T02bsu010_u:79: etattu paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate //
T02bsu010_u:81: magadhadeśarājaḥ śreṇyaḥ bimbisāraḥ te bodhisattvāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko muditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
